name: Agora Labs, INC
description: Agora Inc provides real-time communication solutions. The company offers real-time video calling, voice calling, live audio and video streaming, recording, and real-time messaging. It serves the gaming, retail, and education industries. The company operates in the People's Republic of China and the United States of America and the majority of its revenue is derived from the People's Republic of China.
one_liner: Agora Inc provides real-time communication solutions. The company offers real-time video calling, voice calling, live audio and video streaming, recording, and real-time messaging. It serves the gaming, retail, and education industries. The company operates in the People's Republic of China and the United States of America and the majority of its revenue is derived from the People's Republic of China.

name: Baycon, Inc.
description: Operator of a B2C and B2B eSIM platform called 'eSIM Easy" with an emphasis on elevating roaming services for inbound and outbound travelers globally.
one_liner: Operator of a B2C and B2B eSIM platform called 'eSIM Easy" with an emphasis on elevating roaming services for inbound and outbound travelers globally.

name: C2M Technologies, Inc.
description: Developer of an online social application designed to help people chat with others anonymously. The company's application offers to create chat rooms and sort conversations according to user liking, enabling people to make new friends and stay in touch with each other.
one_liner: Developer of an online social application designed to help people chat with others anonymously. The company's application offers to create chat rooms and sort conversations according to user liking, enabling people to make new friends and stay in touch with each other.

name: Lightspeed Photonics Pte. Ltd.
description: Manufacturer of optical interconnects intended to integrate processors with high data rate optics to build a modular compute+interconnect heterogeneous system-in-package. The company's products include modular optoelectronic processors and interconnects for data centers and near-edge computing resulting in a scalable server reducing data latency, footprint, and power consumption while increasing the data bandwidth and performance per watt, enabling clients to receive better performance at half the power.
one_liner: Manufacturer of optical interconnects intended to integrate processors with high data rate optics to build a modular compute+interconnect heterogeneous system-in-package. The company's products include modular optoelectronic processors and interconnects for data centers and near-edge computing resulting in a scalable server reducing data latency, footprint, and power consumption while increasing the data bandwidth and performance per watt, enabling clients to receive better performance at half the power.

name: MLNETWORKSIO,INC.
description: MLNetworks helps Telcos to design, operate and optimize their networks more intelligently through an end-to-end data platform.
one_liner: MLNetworks helps Telcos to design, operate and optimize their networks more intelligently through an end-to-end data platform.
industry: AI/Machine Learning, Accounting, Data & Analytics, SaaS, Telecommunications

name: REACHWARE, INC.
description: Operator of an integration platform as a service (IPaaS) designed for systems to talk seamlessly with each other and allows separate SaaS (software as a service) systems to function as a unified ecosystem. The company's platform offers to create an echo system by integrating all business applications with each other, adding more value to customers by automating the business processes, scaling up the business by eliminating all the system impediments and manual work, transforming the systems to be connected and on the cloud managed by reach ware API (Application Programming Interface) Gateway and providing deep insights, enabling clients to automate their business processes to be more efficient and agile.
one_liner: Operator of an integration platform as a service (IPaaS) designed for systems to talk seamlessly with each other and allows separate SaaS (software as a service) systems to function as a unified ecosystem. The company's platform offers to create an echo system by integrating all business applications with each other, adding more value to customers by automating the business processes, scaling up the business by eliminating all the system impediments and manual work, transforming the systems to be connected and on the cloud managed by reach ware API (Application Programming Interface) Gateway and providing deep insights, enabling clients to automate their business processes to be more efficient and agile.

name: Spext Labs Inc.
description: Developer of an online platform designed to make voice media creation as easy and ubiquitous as text. The company's platform uses artificial intelligence to fuse speech and text to automate transcription, voice editing, and repurposing of voice content, enabling users to convert recorded content into useful content faster.
one_liner: Developer of an online platform designed to make voice media creation as easy and ubiquitous as text. The company's platform uses artificial intelligence to fuse speech and text to automate transcription, voice editing, and repurposing of voice content, enabling users to convert recorded content into useful content faster.

name: Synervoz Communications Inc.
description: Developer of an innovation & software studio intended to focus on audio, entertainment, and online collaboration. The company has designed, developed, and co-created apps, SDKs, and embedded products with complex audio pipelines focused on custom engineering solutions for other companies and source code that can be licensed or purchased outright, enabling clients to have access to applications that are balanced in real-time and offers non-live content that can be synchronized between parties.
one_liner: Developer of an innovation & software studio intended to focus on audio, entertainment, and online collaboration. The company has designed, developed, and co-created apps, SDKs, and embedded products with complex audio pipelines focused on custom engineering solutions for other companies and source code that can be licensed or purchased outright, enabling clients to have access to applications that are balanced in real-time and offers non-live content that can be synchronized between parties.
industry: AI/Machine Learning, AudioTech, Developer Tools, Gaming, No Code, Telecommunications, Deep Tech, Augmented Reality / Virtual Reality, Entertainment / Media, Consumer, Network Effects

name: Textla Inc.
description: Developer of Saas technology platform intended to help small businesses reach their customers on the go via SMS. The company's platform offers SMS communication tools by providing CpaaS APIs, smart insights, and significant cost savings, enabling businesses to optimize their outreach efforts, enhance efficiency, and save time.
